mods.abstract: Three color window card (black, blue, and red on white) announcing the Pilgrimage Music and Cultural Festival featuring Jack White, Chris Stapleton, Lionel Richie, Dave Matthews and Time Reynolds, Hozier, Brandi Carlile, Counting Crows, Amos Lee, Bleachers, Lord Huron, Dawes, Maggie Rogers, Elle King, Mat Kearney, Valerie June, the Struts, Jade Bird, Kevin Griffin, Keb' Mo' Band, Pete Yorn, the Record Company, Rebirth Brass Band, the Infamous Stringdusters, John Moreland, Caitlyn Smith, Robert Finley, Aaron Lee Tasjan, Low Cut Connie, Courtney Marie Andrews, Devon Gilfillian, Tyminski, Caroline Rose, Jillian Jacqueline, Joshua Hedley, Sarah Shook and the Disarmers, Patrick Droney, JT Hodges, Bishop Gunn, AHI, the White Buffalo, Madisen Ward and the mama Bear, the Rumba Madre, Ivory Layne, Tall Heights, the Fairfield Four, Lilly Hiatt, Kansas Bible Company, the Sweet Water Warblers, Wild Rivers, Donovan Woods, Emma Hern, the Voodoo Fix, Whitney Rose, Jake Leg Stompers, Hymn For Her, Liz

subject.topic: White Buffalo (Musical group : Los Angeles, Calif.)
